rds.vaadin.beanfaces.impl.introspection

Class DefaultBeanIntrospector

  • java.lang.Object
    • rds.vaadin.beanfaces.impl.introspection.DefaultBeanIntrospector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DefaultBeanIntrospector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Allows to introspect a bean according to some defined annotations. Statically holds a cache map for each known beans. If bean metadata for a bean already exists it retreives it from the cache.
    Author:
    Raphael Rougemont
    See Also:
